object
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  object.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

A connection object consists of two nodes and an Connection and is used as the basis of this program to solve the algorithms, it also contains a unique ID to identify if needed.

Author:
Curtis Stokes

Field Summary
private  int CONNECTION_ID
          This is a uniquely identifying feature of an Connection which is assigned on creation.
private static java.util.ArrayList<Connection> connectionList
          A dynamic array list of connections that will hold all connections currently in the problem and solution
private  Edge edge
          The edge object of the connection.
private static int IDToGive
          This is a counter in order to keep providing unique ID's, it is increased every time a Connection is made and will equal the highest id+1 when a problem is opened.
private  Node[] nodes
          A node array of size two that contains both the nodes of the connection.

          Empty constructor
Connection(Node[] nodesIn, Edge edgeIn)
          Default constructor used when creating a new connection.
Connection(java.lang.String[] details)
          Constructor used when creating existing nodes after opening a problem.
 
Method Summary
static java.util.ArrayList<Connection> getAllConnections()
          Method to get the list of all connections.
static Connection getConnectionFromID(int id)
          Returns the connection which matches the input id.
static java.util.ArrayList<Connection> getConnectionsContaining(java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
          Method used to get a list of connections that are joint to a list of nodes, this is used in Primm's to see all connections that are able to be considered.
static java.util.ArrayList<Connection> getConnectionsContaining(Node n)
          Returns the connection that contains the node n
 Edge getEdge()
          Method to get the edge of the connection
 int getID()
          Method to get the ID of the connection that called it.
 Node getNode(int nodeToGet)
          Method to get either node one or node two, works by return the node at index 0 if 1 is passed, and the node at index 1 if 2 is passed.
 java.lang.String[] getSaveDetails()
          Used in saving, gets all the details that are saved in the correct order as a string[], in the format CONNECTION_ID Node1Label Node2Label EdgeID
 boolean matches(Connection other)
          Method to check whether a connection has node that matches to another connections node, used in primms

A dynamic array list of connections that will hold all connections currently in the problem and solution

IDToGive

private static int IDToGive
This is a counter in order to keep providing unique ID's, it is increased every time a Connection is made and will equal the highest id+1 when a problem is opened.

This is a uniquely identifying feature of an Connection which is assigned on creation.
